roleset.name: turn around, change direction

example.name: typical usage
example.text: The spinoff argument, after all, reverses the current notion that assets are worth more to private buyers than to public shareholders.
example.arg: the current notion that assets are worth more to private buyers than to public shareholders

example.name: nice reciprocal example
example.text: Mr. Marcus believes spot steel prices will continue to fall through early 1990 and then reverse themselves.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls 45.4

predicate.note: Frames file for 'reverse' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Loose comparison to turn.
